revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=WatchGuard |model=Firebox M300 |revision=(ML3AE8) |asin=B00WYOVDQA |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EOL (12/31/2022) |est_release_date=05/2017 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=T2081 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032N90TFI04 |fla2=8 GiB |fla2_brand=Transcend |fla2_model=SD Card |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Transcend |ram1_model=DIMM |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1543 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6171R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=7 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, Hardware Monitor;Winbond;W83793G;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;2;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;2;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, 30V 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS7694;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;TI;SN74LVC08A;;3;,,, SPI Interface Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3205;;1;,,, Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS3669S;;1;,,, 4.5V-17V Input 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54320;;4;,,, 16-bit Transparent D-Type Latch w/3-State Output;TI;SN74AVC16373;;1;,,, Single-Phase D-CAP/CAP2 Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51518;;1;,,, 40A Synchronous Buck Gate Driver;International Rectifier;IR3553;;2;,,, Dual Output Digital Multi-Phase Controller;International Rectifier;IR3570B;;1;,,, 350MHz Clock Frequency Synthesizer;Integrated Circuit Systems;ICS8431I-21;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, power switch, heatsink, fan, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2014.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.12.19-rt30;WatchGuard Fireware OS v12.4.1.B595401; |default_ip=10.0.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=readwrite }} {{TagLine|WatchGuard Firebox M300}} :[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/Firebox_M200_M300_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide] {{â€¢}} [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/Firebox_M200_M300_quickstartguide.pdf Quick Start Guide] {{See also|Project:Network/Hardware Specific/WatchGuard|WatchGuard}} *[https://www.rovi.dk/watchguard-m300-firewall/ ''WatchGuard M300'' on '''rovi.dk ''' blog] (DK) :CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] T2081 @1.8GHz :(PowerPC 4C/8T 64-bit Core e6500) ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' T2081 Quad Core 64-bit PowerPC (@1.5GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3L ECC U-DIMM *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card *Network: 8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 100-240V C13 ==Images== File:WatchGuard Firebox M300 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:WatchGuard Firebox M300 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ---- __NOTOC__
